title: This isn't right?
body:
Since lastnight I have been joining games and constantly been getting disconnected? I'm not the only one this is happening too, my friend has the same problem and Ive been in games where whole teams are disconnecting and reconnecting all the time.

Now here is what annoys me, I have just been given a low priority queue time for "afking", can't riot tell the difference between someone being constantly disconnected to being connected and standing in the same spot?

Fix this.

replies.body:
>can't riot tell the difference between someone being constantly disconnected to being connected and standing in the same spot?

Considering the shoddy coding they use, no. A person who stands still for a long time is actually forcefully disconnected from the game.
